title: SMP Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for 08 Cabin Assistant & Pointsman Posts
description: The Syama Prasad Mookerjee Port (SMP) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 08Â Cabin Assistants, Pointsman Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th can apply for the SMP Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salar...
